name: snore
flavor_text: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
effect_text_extend: Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect_text_simple: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.
